Instruction: In a large bowl, combine baby spinach, sliced almonds, thinly sliced red onion, crumbled feta cheese, and sliced kiwis.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, honey, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Serve immediately as a refreshing side salad.
